### Data Catalog:

**Definition:** Inventory of data assets with metadata.

### Contents:
| Element | Description |
|---------|-------------|
| Datasets | Available data |
| Schemas | Structure |
| Owners | Responsible parties |
| Descriptions | Documentation |

### Metadata Types:

| Type | Examples |
|------|----------|
| Technical | Schema, types |
| Business | Descriptions |
| Operational | Lineage, freshness |

### Compliance Areas:

| Regulation | Focus |
|------------|-------|
| GDPR | Data privacy |
| HIPAA | Health data |
| SOX | Financial data |
| CCPA | Consumer privacy |

### Security Practices:

| Practice | Purpose |
|----------|--------|
| Encryption | Protect data |
| Masking | Hide sensitive |
| Auditing | Track access |
| Classification | Sensitivity levels |

### RBAC:

**Definition:** Access based on user roles.

### Components:
| Component | Example |
|-----------|--------|
| Role | Data Analyst |
| Permission | Read access |
| Resource | Sales database |

### Data Steward:

**Role:** Responsible for data domain.

### Duties:
| Task | Purpose |
|------|--------|
| Define standards | Consistency |
| Ensure quality | Accuracy |
| Manage access | Security |
| Document | Understanding |
